participant_1.background:
I am determined to work hard and be the best that I can be, despite my circumstances.
I'm proud of my ability to live on my own and support myself.
i want to be alone sometimes.
I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
my children are mostly grown.

participant_2.background:
I trust God to help me stay healthy, even when I am too busy to take care of myself.
and , my best friend is cayden.
I started dating again and went to the movies on Sundays with my new love.
I don't bike as much as my family but I love to curl up with a good book.
I wear clothes that make me look more youthful.

content.text: Not much just got home from a Sunday movie date with my new love.
Oh how exciting! What movie did you see?
It was called "The Greatest Showman". It was a really good movie.
I've heard good things about that movie. I've been meaning to see it.
You should definitely check it out. It was really entertaining.
I will for sure. I love musicals.
Me too! What's your favorite musical?
I really like "Hamilton". It's so good.
I've heard good things about that one too. I've been meaning to see it.
You should definitely check it out. It's really good.
I will for sure. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! Have you heard of the new musical "Be More Chill"?
No I haven't. Is it any good?
I haven't seen it yet but I've heard good things about it.
You should for sure. It's a pretty popular musical right now.
I will for sure. Thank you for the recommendation.
